nodes.bodyText:
@waab76 - I'm wondering, if this is refer back to ApplicationFields.APPLICATION_SSO_SIGNONMODE and all the events will refer to Event fields..etc.
all the user_id in the PR, must refer to UserFields.java(USER_ID) isn't it ?

Yes, every field in GraylogSchemaFields should now be represented somewhere else and GraylogSchemaFields will be removed once all existing users (currently just Okta) have switched over to the new field definitions.
